mapper.insert: insert into comment(is_private, user_seq, board_seq, insert_date, content ) values(#{isPrivate}, #{userSeq}, #{boardSeq}, now(), #{content})
mapper.select: select comment_seq commentSeq, content, co.insert_date insertDate, is_private isPrivate, u.user_seq userSeq, board_seq boardSeq, u.nickname nickname from comment co join user u on co.user_seq= u.user_seq where board_seq = #{boardSeq} order by comment_seq desc
